desc:
We need to start tailoring the password wallet a bit more to properly store information like Medical, Insurance etc. We should probably change the name to something like Personal Store etc. to cater for the increase in functionality and to make more sense.

Check the following URL for medical information example:

http://notalone.org.za/join-for-free/#sthash.aXjEUf2E.dpbs

Basically, we need to start storing life information of a person. Everything that needs storing.
name: VW - Expanding the Wallet
